net.sf.opensftp
Interface Prompter

All Known Implementing Classes:
SwingPrompter
public interface Prompter

Prompter is used to retrieve the user's choice when he must make one. It's a classic scenario that when the StrictHostKeyChecking property values 'ask', and the user attempts to connect to a host which has not been registered in the known_hosts file, the user must decide whether to continue or not.

Author:
BurningXFlame

Method Summary
 boolean promptYesNo(String str)
          Retrieve the user's decision.
 

Method Detail

promptYesNo

boolean promptYesNo(String str)
Retrieve the user's decision.

Parameters:
str - The prompting message.
Returns:
The user's choice. True if yes, false otherwise.
